ComicInfo.Title: Part 1
ComicInfo.Series: Hack/Slash & Mercy Sparx: A Slice of Hell
ComicInfo.Summary: Angels and Demons, Slashers and Killers - discerning them can all get so confusing. What happens when Mercy and Hank need the relic of a slasher on Cassie and Vlad's hit list? Even worse, when the slasher wants it back? It's a fun violent romp that brings DDP's sexiest seductresses together for the first time.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-07 23:10:53. [CVDB312222]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cassie Hack, Henry Brünink, Mercy Sparx, Nahmat, Vlad
